agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent who is being tracked in the timeline data.

duration.description: The duration of the agent's activity or engagement during the specified timeframe.

engagement_count.description: The total number of engagements or interactions the agent had during the specified timeframe.

start_time.description: The timestamp indicating when the agent's activity started.

status.description: The current status of the agent's activity or availability.
